segments.text: How many orders do we still need to pack , Gale ? We've been packing all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We still have to do about ten more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . I am really tired from packing all of the stuff all day . And it's about time to clock out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Maybe we can finish it tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ! These orders are not urgent . We could do it first thing tomorrow morning
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Let's call it quits and go home .
segments.speaker: S2
